basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1">Light Armors</label>

basic.desc: You may bury a card from your hand to add 1d10 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) to your Strength, Melee, or Constitution check.
You may move at the end of your turn (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>) and/or move another character to the location where you end your turn).

berserker.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1">Light Armors</label>

berserker.desc: You may bury a card from your hand (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>or the top card of your deck) to add 1d10 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>)(<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+2</label>)(<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+3</label>)(<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5">+4</label>) to your Strength, Melee, or Constitution check.
You may move at the end of your turn (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>) and/or move another character to the location where you end your turn).
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>When you start your turn you may draw 1 (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox6">2</label>) card(s).
<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox8"></label>Add 2 (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox9">4</label>) to your check to acquire a weapon.
<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox10"></label>When you play Blessing of Gorum, add d12 instead of the normal die.

juggernaut.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1">Light Armors</label>

juggernaut.desc: You may bury a card from your hand to add 1d10 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>)(<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+2</label>)(<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+3</label>) to your Strength, Melee, or Constitution check.
You may move at the end of your turn (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>) and/or move another character to the location where you end your turn).

<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>When you are dealt Combat (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox6"></label>or any other type of) damage, reduce that damage by 1.
<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox8"></label>Add 2 (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox9">4</label>) to your check to acquire a armor.
<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox10"></label>When you play Blessing of Gorum, add d12 instead of the normal die.

basic.desc: After you play a spell with the Arcane trait, you may examine the top card of your deck; if it’s a spell, you may put it in your hand.
If you acquire a card with the Magic trait during an exploration, you may immediately explore again.
<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>Add (1) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">2</label>) to your check to recharge a card.

evoker.desc: After you play a spell with the Arcane trait, you may examine the top card of your deck; if it’s a spell, you may put it in your hand.
If you acquire a card with the Magic trait during an exploration, you may immediately explore again.

<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>Add 1 (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">2</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">3</label>) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">4</label>) to your check to recharge a card.

<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>Add 2 to your Arcane check with the Force (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>or Acid and Cold) (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>or Electricity and Fire) trait(s).
<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>Add 2 (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9">4</label>) to your check to acquire a spell.

illusionist.desc: After you play a spell with the Arcane trait, you may examine the top card of your deck; if it’s a spell, you may put it in your hand.
If you acquire a card with the Magic trait during an exploration, you may immediately explore again.

<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>Add 1 (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">2</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">3</label>) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">4</label>) to your check to recharge a card.
<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label>If you play a spell to evade a monster, you may put the monster on the bottom of the deck.

<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>Add 2 (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9">4</label>) to your check to acquire a spell (<input id="powbox12" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox12"></label>or ally).
<input id="powbox11" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox11"></label>At the start of your turn, you may discard a card to draw a card.

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1">Light Armors</label>

basic.desc: At the end of your turn, you may examine the top card (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">or bottom card</label>) of your deck.

You may recharge a card to add 1d4 (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+ 1</label>)(<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+ 2</label>) to a combat check at another location.

sniper.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1">Light Armors</label>

sniper.desc: At the end of your turn, you may examine the top card (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">or bottom card</label>) of your deck.

You may recharge a card to add 1d4 (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+ 1</label>)(<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+ 2</label>)(<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+ 3</label>)(<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5">+ 4</label>) to a combat check at another location.
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>When you start your turn you may draw 1 (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox6">2</label>) card(s).
<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox8"></label>When you play a weapon with the Ranged Trait you may recharge it instead of discarding it.)
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox9"></label>You gain the skill Divine: Wisdom +1
<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox10"></label>When you play a blessing to add to your Dexterity check, add d12 instead of the normal die.

tracker.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1">Light Armors</label>

tracker.desc: At the end of your turn, you may examine the top card (<input id="pow1" type="checkbox" /><label for="pow1">or bottom card</label>)(<input id="pow2" type="checkbox" /><label for="pow2">or both</label>) of your deck.

You may recharge a card to add 1d4 (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+ 1</label>)(<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+ 2</label>)(<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+ 3</label>) to a combat check at another location.
<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox5"></label>Add 1d8 (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox6">+ 1</label>) to your check to defeat a bane with the Giant trait.
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox9"></label>When you play an ally with the Animal trait, you may recharge it instead of discarding it.
<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox10"></label>You gain the skill Divine: Wisdom +1
<input id="powbox11" type="checkbox"/><label for="powbox11"></label>When you play a blessing to add to your Wisdom check, add d12 instead of the normal die.

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1">Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2">Heavy Armors</label>

basic.desc: Instead of your first exploration on a turn, you may reveal a card with the Divine trait to choose a character at your location. Shuffle 1d4+1 ( <input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+2</label>) random cards from his discard pile into his deck, then discard the card you revealed.
Add 1d8 (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+1</label>) with the Magic trait to your check to defeat a bane with the Undead trait.

healer.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1">Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2">Heavy Armors</label>

healer.desc: Instead of your first exploration on a turn, you may reveal a card with the Divine trait to choose a character at your location. Shuffle 1d4+1 ( <input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+2</label>)( <input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+3</label>) random cards from his discard pile into his deck, then discard the card you revealed ( <input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>and draw a card).
Add 1d8 (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+1</label>) with the Magic trait to your check to defeat a bane with the Undead trait.
<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>Add 2 (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6">4</label>) to your check to acquire a boon with the Divine trait.

<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>When you play Blessing of Sarenrae, you may recharge it (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>or shuffle it into your deck) instead of discarding it.

exorcist.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1">Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2">Heavy Armors</label>

exorcist.desc: Instead of your first exploration on a turn, you may reveal a card with the Divine trait to choose a character at your location. Shuffle 1d4+1 ( <input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+2</label>) random cards from his discard pile into his deck, then discard the card you revealed.

Add 1d8 (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+1</label>) with the Magic trait to your check to defeat a bane with the Undead (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or Outsider) trait.
<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>Add 2 to your check to acquire armor (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>or weapon).

<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>When you play Blessing of Sarenrae, you may recharge it (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>or place it on top of your deck) instead of discarding it.

<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>If you defeat a bane with the Undead (<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label>or Outsider) trait, you may shuffle 1 random card from your discard pile into your deck.

basic.desc: Once per check, you may recharge a card to add 1d4 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) to a check attempted by another character at your location.
At the start of your turn, you may exchange 1 card in your hand with 1 card of the same type in your discard pile.

virtuoso.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1">Light Armors</label>

virtuoso.desc: Once per check, you may recharge a card to add 1d4 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+3</label>) to a check attempted by (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>you or) another character at your location.
At the start (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>or end) of your turn, you may exchange 1 card in your hand with 1 card of the same type in your discard pile.
<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>Add 2 to your check to acquire an ally.
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>Add 2 to your check to recharge (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>or acquire) a spell.
<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>When you play Blessing of Shelyn, add d12 instead of the normal die.

charlatan.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1">Light Armors</label>

charlatan.desc: Once per check, you may recharge a card to add 1d4 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+3</label>) to a check attempted by another character at your location.
At the start of your turn, you may exchange 1 card in your hand with 1 card of the same type in your discard pile.

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>Add 2 to your check to acquire an ally  ((<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>) or defeat a henchman) ((<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>) or villain).
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>You automatically succeed at your check to recharge a card with the Mental trait.
<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>When you play Blessing of Shelyn, add d12 instead of the normal die.

basic.desc: When you play an ally with the Animal trait, you may recharge it instead of discarding it.

You may reveal an ally with the Animal trait to add 1d4 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) to your check.
You may discard a card to roll d10 instead of your Strength or Dexterity die for any check.

shapeshifter.desc: When you play an ally with the Animal trait, you may recharge it instead of discarding it.

You may reveal an ally with the Animal trait to add 1d4 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+3</label>) to your check.

You may discard a card to roll d10 (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>with the fire trait) instead of your Strength or Dexterity die for any check.
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>Add 2 (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8">4</label>) to your check to acquire an ally with the Animal trait.
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>When you play a blessing to add to your Wisdom check, add d12 instead of the normal die.

wild warden.desc: When you play an ally with the Animal trait, you may recharge it instead of discarding it.

You may reveal an ally with the Animal trait to add 1d4 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+3</label>) (<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10">+4</label>) to your check.
You may discard a card to roll d10 instead of your Strength or Dexterity die for any check.
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>Add 2 (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8">4</label>) to your Divine check when playing a spell.
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>Add 1d8 with the Magic trait to your check to defeat a bane with the Animal trait.
<input id="powbox11" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox11"></label>When you play a blessing to add to your Wisdom check, add d12 instead of the normal die.

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1" >Light Armors</label>

basic.desc: You may evade your encounter.

If you are the only character at your location, you may recharge a card to add 1d6 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) to your combat check, or discard it to add an additional 1d6.

acrobat.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1" >Light Armors</label>

acrobat.desc: You may evade your encounter (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>and may put the card on top of the deck).

If you are the only character at your location, you may recharge a card to add 1d6 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+3</label>) to your combat check, or discard it to add an additional 1d6.

<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>Add 2 to your noncombat check to defeat a barrier (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>or close a location).
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>Add 2 (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8">4</label>) to your check to acquire an item.
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>When you play a blessing to add to your Dexterity check, you may recharge it instead of discarding it.

thief.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1" >Light Armors</label>

thief.desc: If you are the only character at your location, you may recharge a card to add 1d6 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+3</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+4</label>) to your combat check, or discard it to add an additional 1d6.
<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>Add 2 to your noncombat check to close a location).

<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>Add 2 (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6">3</label>) (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8">4</label>) to your check to acquire an armor, item, or weapon.
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>When you play a blessing to add to your Dexterity check, you may recharge it instead of discarding it.
<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label>You may use Charisma in place of any skill on any check to recharge an armor, item, or weapon with the Magic trait.

basic.desc: When you attempt a combat check without playing a weapon, you may use your Dexterity die instead of your Strength die (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>and add the Magic trait) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>and the Fire trait).
You may play any number of blessings on your combat check; recharge them instead of discarding them.

drunken master.desc: When you attempt a combat check without playing a weapon, you may use your Dexterity die instead of your Strength die (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>and add the Magic trait) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>and the Fire trait).
You may play any number of blessings on your combat check; recharge them instead of discarding them.

<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>When dealt damage other than Combat damage, reduce that damage by 1 (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5">2</label>) (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6">3</label>).
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>When you play a boon with the Liquid trait, succeed at a Fortitude 6 check to recharge it instead of banishing it.
<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>Add 6 to your check to acquire a boon with the Liquid trait.
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>At the start of your turn, you must draw 1 card.

zen archer.desc: When you attempt a combat check without playing a weapon, you may use your Dexterity die instead of your Strength die (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>and add the Magic trait) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>and the Fire trait).
You may play any number of blessings on your combat check; recharge them instead of discarding them.

<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>When dealt damage other than Combat damage, reduce that damage by 1 (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5">2</label>).
<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>When you play a weapon with the Ranged trait, you may recharge it instead of discarding it.
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>Add 2 (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8">4</label>) to your check to acquire a boon with the Ranged trait.
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>When you start your turn with no cards in your hand, you may draw 1 card.

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1" >Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2" >Heavy Armors</label>

basic.desc: You may discard the top card of your deck to add 1d6 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) to your check. If the top card was a blessing (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or spell), recharge it instead of discarding it.

You may examine the top card of your location deck at the start (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or end) of your turn. If it’s a boon, put it on the bottom of the deck.

crusader.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1" >Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2" >Heavy Armors</label>

crusader.desc: You may discard the top card of your deck to add 1d6 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5">+3</label>) to your check. If the top card was a blessing (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or spell), recharge it instead of discarding it.

You may examine the top card of your location deck at the start (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or end) of your turn. If it’s a boon, put it on the bottom (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>or underneath the top card) of the deck.
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>When another character at your location is dealt Combat damage, reduce that damage by 1.
<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>Add 1d8 with the Magic trait to your check to defeat a bane with the Undead trait.

<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>When you play Blessing of Iomedae, you may recharge it (<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label>or shuffle it into your deck) instead.

hospitaler.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1" >Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2" >Heavy Armors</label>

hospitaler.desc: You may discard the top card of your deck to add 1d6 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5">+3</label>) to your check. If the top card was a blessing (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or spell), recharge it instead of discarding it.

You may examine the top card of your location deck at the start (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or end) of your turn. If it’s a boon, put it on the bottom (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>or underneath the top card) of the deck.

<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>During your turn, you may bury a Divine card and choose a character at your location to shuffle 1d4+1 random cards from his discard pile into his deck.

<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>When you play Blessing of Iomedae, you may recharge it (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>or shuffle it into your deck) instead.

basic.desc: For your combat check, you may discard a card to roll your Arcane die + 1d6 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) with the Attack, Fire, and Magic traits. This counts as playing a spell.
You automatically succeed at your check to recharge a spell (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or item) with the Arcane trait.

abyssal sorcerer.desc: For your combat check, you may discard a card to roll your Arcane die + 1d6 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+3</label>) (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5">+4</label>) with the Fire (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>or Acid) trait and the Attack and Magic traits. This counts as playing a spell.
You automatically succeed at your check to recharge a spell (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or item) with the Arcane trait.

<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>Reduce Fire (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>and Acid and Cold) damage dealt to you by 1 (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>2).
<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label>When you play Blessing of Pharasma, add d12 instead of the normal die.
<input id="powbox11" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox11"></label>At the start of your turn, you may banish an ally to draw 3 cards.

celestial sorcerer.desc: For your combat check, you may discard a card to roll your Arcane die + 1d6 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+3</label>) (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5">+4</label>) with the Fire (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>or Acid) trait and the Attack and Magic traits. This counts as playing a spell.
You automatically succeed at your check to recharge a spell (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or item) with the Arcane trait.
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>If you would fail a check by 1, you may bury a card to succeed.

<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>Reduce Fire (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>and Electricity) damage dealt to you by 1 (<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label>2).
<input id="powbox11" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox11"></label>When you play Blessing of Pharasma, add d12 instead of the normal die.

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1" >Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2" >Heavy Armors</label>

basic.desc: Add 1d4 (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5">+2</label>) to another character’s combat check at your location.
When you play a weapon, you may recharge it instead of discarding it.

guardian.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1" >Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2" >Heavy Armors</label>

guardian.desc: Add 1d4 (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox12" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox12">+3</label>) to another character’s combat check at your location.
When you play a weapon (<input id="powbox11" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox11"></label>or armor), you may recharge it instead of discarding it.

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>When another character at your location is dealt Combat damage, reduce that damage by 1 (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7">2</label>).
<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>Add 2 (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9">4</label>) to your check to acquire an armor.
<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label>When you play a blessing to add to your Constitution check, add d12 instead of the normal die.

weapon master.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1" >Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2" >Heavy Armors</label>

weapon master.desc: Add 1d4 (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox12" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox12">+3</label>) to another character’s combat check at your location.
When you play a weapon, you may recharge it (<input id="powbox11" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox11"></label>or shuffle it into your deck) instead of discarding it.
<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>You may use Melee in place of Ranged when using a weapon with the Ranged trait.
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>Add 2 (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>4) to your check to acquire a weapon.
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>When you play a blessing to add to your Strength check, add d12 instead of the normal die.
